name: Popper's Combusteria
description:
Popper's CombusteriaPlay as both firework maker and enthusiast! Help make fireworks for customers and unlock new stars/colors for your own show.

Collect orders from customers and fulfill them properly to earn a little bit of extra cash. As you make these fireworks you'll unlock new stars and colors for your own personal firework show! At the end of 3 days you'll get a chance to try your own show. Be wary, as the fireworks you launch will all need to be cleaned up afterwards. If you feel like trying out making the biggest show possible, hop into Freeplay where you'll gain access to all colors and types of fireworks for an incredible 30 second show!

Try your hand at making the coolest 30 second firework show man has ever seen!
